long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The KIMS Order filter Chrome Extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance the ordering process 
for kuku foods restaurant managers. With this extension installed, restaurant managers gain quick access to the KIMS 
(kuku foods Inventory Management System) website through a convenient link added to their Chrome browser.

Once on the KIMS website, the extension provides an added functionality in the form of a custom filter.
This filter specifically focuses on displaying approved orders, streamlining the order management process for restaurant managers.
No longer will you need to sift through a sea of orders to find the exact approved order.
The extension simplifies this task by displaying only the orders that have been approved as you specify.

This extension significantly improves efficiency and productivity for kuku foods restaurant managers, allowing them to swiftly navigate 
to the KIMS website and view the approved orders. With just a click, managers can access the website and instantly focus on the most 
critical information they need, saving valuable time and effort.

With its user-friendly interface and seamless integration into the Chrome browser and KIMS website, the  KIMS Order filter Chrome Extension revolutionizes
the way kuku foods restaurant managers handle their orders.
Experience enhanced convenience effortlessly with this indispensable tool at your fingertips.
